org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades

Interface Blade

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    App, Box, Bytes, Collection<ENTRY_TYPE>, Durable, FacilityPropertyChangeSubscriber, FLenS<RESPONSE_TYPE>, IncDes, Initiator, JABoolean, JADouble, JAFloat, JAInteger, JAList<ENTRY_TYPE>, JALong, JAMap<KEY_TYPE,VALUE_TYPE>, JAString, MapEntry<KEY_TYPE,VALUE_TYPE>, Root, ServiceChangeReceiver<T>, Tuple, Union, VLenS<RESPONSE_TYPE>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Activator, Activator, Activator, AppBase, BladeBase, BList, BMap, BoxImpl, BytesImpl, CollectionImpl, Delay, DurableImpl, EventBus, Facility, FacilityActivator, FactoriesImporter, FactoryLocatorActivator, FLenScalar, HelloService, IncDesImpl, IntegerBMap, IntegerSMap, IsolationBlade, JABooleanImpl, JADoubleImpl, JAFloatImpl, JAIntegerImpl, JALongImpl, JAServiceTracker, JAStringImpl, Load, LocateService, LongBMap, LongSMap, MapEntryImpl, NonBlockingBlade, Plant, Printer, RootImpl, Scalar, SList, SMap, StringBMap, StringSMap, TupleImpl, UnionImpl, VLenScalar

    public interface Blade

    Blades must implement the Blade interface to provide access to their targetReactor.

    Sample Usage:

     public class BladeSample implements Blade {
     private final Reactor processor;

     BladeSample(final Reactor _processor) {
         processor = _processor;
     }

     @Override
     public final Reactor getTargetReactor() {
         return processor;
     }
 }

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Reactor getReactor()
      Returns the targetReactor associated with this blade.
